plot: A Vlog over coffee from one fashion blogger trying to live a full and fashionable life... and cut down on the sarcasm and caffeine. Currently, failing at both. Hear about daily life, fashion advice, and ask questions.
plot_en: A Vlog over coffee from one fashion blogger trying to live a full and fashionable life... and cut down on the sarcasm and caffeine. Currently, failing at both. Hear about daily life, fashion advice, and ask questions.

title: CoffeeTalk
